module.sqlWrap: update UserPassport set PassportStatus=999 where PassportId = @Id
select PassportId from UserPassport where Email = @Email;
select PassportId from UserPassport where Mobile = @Mobile;
select PassportId from UserPassport where UserName = @UserName;
select * from UserPassport where PassportId = @Id; select * from UserSecurity where PassportId = @Id;

select PassportId, UserName, Email, Mobile, PassportStatus, CreatedTime,LastModifiedTime, RoleId,RoleName from (select up.PassportId, up.UserName, up.Email, up.Mobile,up.PassportStatus,up.RoleId,up.RoleType,up.CreatedTime,up.LastModifiedTime,r.Name as RoleName from UserPassport up left join Role r on upRoleId = r.RoleId ) _TTT where RoleType=1 and (PassportStatus not in(999)) and (PassportId not in(@ExceptIds)) and (Mobile like @Keyword or UserName like @Keyword or Email like @Keyword) order by PassportId asc
select * from UserPassport where (Mobile = @Keyword or UserName = @Keyword or Email = @Keyword)
